sentences.en: We can only spare one room for you.
sentences.cn: 我们只能给你腾出一个房间。

sentences.en: They only have one room left: you'll have to double up with Peter.
sentences.cn: 他们只剩下一个房间，你只好与彼得合住了。

sentences.en: One room contained a gallery of paintings commemorating great moments in baseball history.
sentences.cn: 有一间房间里有一个画廊，陈列着纪念棒球史上伟大时刻的绘画作品。
